'use strict';module.exports=prolog;prolog.displayName='prolog';prolog.aliases=[];function prolog(Prism){Prism.languages.prolog={// Syntax depends on the implementation
comment:[/%.+/,/\/\*[\s\S]*?\*\//],// Depending on the implementation, strings may allow escaped newlines and quote-escape
string:{pattern:/(["'])(?:\1\1|\\(?:\r\n|[\s\S])|(?!\1)[^\\\r\n])*\1/,greedy:true},builtin:/\b(?:fx|fy|xf[xy]?|yfx?)\b/,variable:/\b[A-Z_]\w*/,// FIXME: Should we list all null-ary predicates (not followed by a parenthesis) like halt, trace, etc.?
function:/\b[a-z]\w*(?:(?=\()|\/\d+)/,number:/\b\d+\.?\d*/,// Custom operators are allowed
operator:/[:\\=><\-?*@\/;+^|!$.]+|\b(?:is|mod|not|xor)\b/,punctuation:/[(){}\[\],]/};}
